mapper.select: SELECT a.product_pk, a.product_category_pk, a.product_name, a.product_price, b.original_file_name, b.stored_file_path FROM product as a JOIN product_file as b ON a.product_pk = b.idx

SELECT a.product_pk, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_store, a.product_stock_cnt, b.original_file_name, b.stored_file_path FROM product as a JOIN product_file as b ON a.product_pk = b.idx WHERE product_pk = #{productPk}

SELECT review_pk, board_category_pk, review_title, review_contents, review_score, create_id, product_pk, order_pk, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS create_date, DATE_FORMAT(update_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS update_date FROM review WHERE product_pk = #{productPk} AND deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY product_pk DESC

SELECT qna_pk, board_category_pk, qna_title, qna_contents, create_id, product_pk, answer_contents, answer_yn, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS create_date FROM qna WHERE product_pk = #{productPk} AND deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY product_pk DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (product_pk, qna_title, qna_contents, create_id, create_date) VALUES (#{productPk}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContents}, #{createId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_pk, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_store, b.order_pk, b.order_cnt, b.order_sum, b.product_pk FROM product as a JOIN orders_detail as b ON a.product_pk = b.product_pk AND b.order_pk = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (order_pk, customer_pk, order_name, order_phone, zip, addr1, addr2, order_date) VALUES (#{orderPk}, 1, #{orderName}, #{orderPhone}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, NOW())
INSERT INTO orders_detail (order_pk, product_pk, order_cnt, order_sum) VALUES (1, #{productPk}, #{orderCnt}, #{orderSum});
